import React, {Fragment} from "react" import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import bannerpalmtrees from "../img/bannerpalmtrees.jpg" import { useHoverLeave } from "../function/useHoverLeave" const HotelSpecialsCard = () => { const [ref,hovered] = useHoverLeave(); return (
